headline: Fidelity National Information Services (FIS) Increased Its Stock Repurchase Plan. Here’s Why
summary: Longleaf Partners, managed by Southeastern Asset Management, released its “Partners Fund” third-quarter 2025 investor letter. The letter can be downloaded here. The fund returned -0.33% in the third quarter, compared to the S&P 500’s 8.12 % return and the Russell 1000 Value’s 5.33% return. The firm is not happy with the flat performance of the portfolio, […]
